name: octobay-contracts
description: Contracts for OctoBay - Ethereum Payment Service for GitHub

scripts.contracts:verify: yarn contracts:verify:kovan:address-storage; yarn contracts:verify:kovan:oracle-storage; yarn contracts:verify:kovan:deposit-storage; yarn contracts:verify:kovan:govnft; yarn contracts:verify:kovan:governor; yarn contracts:verify:kovan:octobay
scripts.subgraph:deploy: graph deploy octobay/octobay --output-dir build/subgraph --ipfs https://api.thegraph.com/ipfs/ --node https://api.thegraph.com/deploy/
scripts.subgraph:deploy-dev: graph deploy octobay/octobay-dev --output-dir build/subgraph --ipfs https://api.thegraph.com/ipfs/ --node https://api.thegraph.com/deploy/
